cast.overview: When the denizens of Littlehampton – including conservative Edith – begin receiving letters full of hilarious profanities, rowdy Irish migrant Rose is charged with the crime. Suspecting something amiss, the town's women band together to investigate.
cast.title: Wicked Little Letters

cast.overview: The UK Prime Minister and US President have a public rivalry that risks their countries' alliance. But when they become targets of a powerful enemy, they're forced to rely on each other as they go on a wild, multinational run. Allied with Noel, a brilliant MI6 agent, they must find a way to thwart a conspiracy that threatens the free world.
cast.title: Heads of State

details.biography: Jamie Chapman is an actor best known for his regular role (Brains) in Ricky Gervais and Stephen Merchant's sitcom 'Extras'. He played 'Ziggy' in 'Red Dwarf' (Series 12) and recently appeared in the festive Netflix hit 'Christmas on Mistletoe Farm' as the stage-struck 'Gerald Faber'. Other screen-work includes The Crown, Nativity Rocks, Catherine Tate's Nan, Eastenders, Holby City, and Doctors. Jamie will shortly be seen in ITV's 'Archie' (the biopic of Cary Grant), and the film 'Wicked Letters' - both in post-production.
details.name: Jamie Chapman
